website_summaries.verdict: This new Double Decker variety, which is covered in suede, is a mixture of a luxurious and toned-down design. Aside from the easy-to-wear slip-on profile of this pair, which is perfect for ladies who are always on the go, the suede upper makes it a premium footwear for daily wear.
pros: It is possible to wear the Keds Double Decker Suede all day due to the comfort it provides, according to many reviewers
The low top slide-on shoe is easy to pair because of its versatile color, some mention
According to many users, this sneaker has a style that is appropriate for daily use
A lot of people enjoy the sufficient support and the ease of the slip-on style of the shoe
Wearers of the Double Decker Suede receive adoration while donning the pair
cons: Few find the side of the Keds Double Decker Suede rubbing the heel bone, which results in having blisters
Several find a tad difference between the color description and the actual one

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! I am between a 7-8 and ordered the 8 based on reviews stating they run small and I’m glad I did they fit me perfectly! The back is rubbing a little on the back of my heels but I’m gonna get a shoe expander and I’m sure that will fix it! They are so CUTE! The color and fabric is exactly As pictured and I’m obsessed! So glad I found these and for half the price that they are anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you hate the back of your ankles
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I really liked my last pair of Keds so decided to get another one. But seriously do not buy this unless you hate the back of your ankles. Yes they run true to size but they are so hard that they will eat into the back of your ankles even with thick socks on. I wish I had tested them at home before wearing thwm outside as I can't return them now
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to have these shoes. They are nice casual shoes, good looking, but the toe box was just too tight for me. The right length but too narrow. If you have narrow feet, you'd probably like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not totally suede.
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little narrow. Top part of shoe is not suede. Cute though. Color as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mari S

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It runs narrow and a bit snug so I had to size up. I wear 10 in dress shoes and flats and 11in sport shoes and boots. I had to return these for an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ulman

customer_reviews.title: Wear these all the time
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time. Color is accurate. They were pretty tight when I first got them, but I also have really high arches. A lot of slip on shoes hurt or rub the top of my feet. After a day they loosen up enough that they are comfortable. I don't think they'd be comfortable if you have wide feet though. Kind of a heavier shoe but well made. I will probably buy in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jackaroo

customer_reviews.title: Might fit Barbie's feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not suede and are VERY narrow. If you have feet that are only 4 inches wide, then you'll be good with these. I've had Keds before and used to wear them all the time, and they were my favorite brand of shoes years ago. I've never had a pair so small they wouldn't fit my feet at all. Very disappointing. The eggplant color is really pretty, and they look decently made, I just wish they weren't so ridiculously small.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Fits very small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual 8.5 and just wore them while I was sitting in bed thinking I could stretch them out a bit, but it cut off circulation to my feet! So I returned and got a 9.5 and while it was better, the back still rubbed on my ankles so I could tell after a long day of wearing them it would rub my ankle raw so returned those too. EDIT: I returned the 9.5 back to UPS and they shipped them, now amazon is saying they haven’t received them. $40 down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice all around shoe, runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe in that it's versatile, cushiony, and lightweight. It's great for any days out without the weight and heat of a full sized sneaker. I like to wear my shoes without socks and this is working out great. Shoe is however pretty narrow, so had to buy a longer shoe in order to fit my foot in it (followed reviewers' advice). This gives me a little more toe room and room for my foot to swell in the heat, but also causes some foot slide. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: webdiva

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable heels - size up
customer_reviews.text: They tore up my heels pretty bad the first time wearing them. The back of the shoe is not flexible or soft at all. I am scared to wear them again with my Keds socks, but I have been wearing them with thick socks to try to stretch them a little. I wish I would have gotten a size larger as I think I would not have had this issue if I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute, a little tighter than normal keds in toe
customer_reviews.text: I like these! I've been wearing them to work on Fridays and they are pretty comfy. They are a little tight around the toesand top of foot at first, but then relax some. It fit true to my normal keds size. The taupe was a little darker than pictured, but they've looked fine with my outfits. I'd buy them again. I think the pinks would look great!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes but they run narrow
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the standard width shoes in my normal Keds size. My foot would not fit into the shoe. The wide cut shoe fits perfectly, however I do not have a wide foot and this is my first time ever ordering a wide shoe so be aware that these most definitely do run narrow. If you have a narrow foot, order these Keds I'm sure you will be super comfy! :)
customer_reviews.author: enr1329

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE SUEDE!
customer_reviews.text: *These run TIGHT* That said, it's a perfect, casual shoe. Goes great with jeans. And YES, they are SUEDE. They are corduroy'd suede.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Very cute shoe but very narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, well made. These are true to size in length but are extremely narrow. I sized up a half size, thinking it would make difference but it's still really really narrow and I have narrow feet. Beyond the narrowness they are perfect and my second pair I've bought. I've gotten more compliments from these shoes and the identical tan pair I have, than any other shoes I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cornaby

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Not like the keds I wore as a teenager back in the day. If you decide to purchase, please know they are not true to size, too tight , and rub against your heels, and sideof foot. The pricing is too high for uncomfortable fitting sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Classy and I don’t want to take them off!
customer_reviews.text: I’m now hooked on these Keds.. literally super comfortable, easy to slide on. Fit perfect, no weird running on the foot - I have a slight bunion (wise foot) but even with these shoes my feet feel in place - fit as expected may run a bit narrow (but not much as my wide toe box fits good). The material is great - lightweight but more of a suede corduroy- just ordered 2 more pairs in different colors. Footbed is cushioned so these feel like slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing -
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these. So cute and comfortable. This is actually my 3rd pair. I have the navy with the shearling inside and the black bedazzled pair that Keds worked with Kate Spade on. They are all Comfy and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: FinleyD

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable, and goes with Everything!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes! They are very comfortable, I was able to wear them all day multiple times on a recent vacation without any blisters or discomfort. I love the slip on look, I feel like they go with long pants, or look great with shorts or Capri length pants. These have been so versatile for me that I’m considering ordering a second color!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Color, Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7W and they’re snug. I would size up. I probably should exchange them but I’m too lazy. I do love the mauve color! And the memory foam is lovely even if the top of the shoe is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits tight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look very nice, the color is just as pictured. The shoe is VERY narrow, even ordering a larger size wasn’t helpful. I do not typically have issues with shoes, so it isn’t a matter of me having a wide foot. Overall, the quality is nice; they seem durable. If you have a narrow foot, I would say that these are a valuable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up as these run narrow
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the 7.5 back and get an 8 as the 7.5 was too narrow. Very cushioney with decent arch support. Look great and the color is spot on as described.
customer_reviews.author: Tallulah

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter but it was a tad to narrow. They fit me just right and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and they fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6.5 in Nike’s and most shoes but every once in a while I have to get a size 6 and sometimes even a 7 depending k the brand of the shoe. These are comfortable and work well with slip on socks. Definitely going to get some in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Abel G Arocha

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have bird feet, order wide fit or a size up!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Very comfy after I ordered two different sizes though. They run very narrow and i had to re-order wide fit ones. But color is pretty and I love em!
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a TTS 8.5 and these fit perfect! So comfy, just enough give to not give my blisters but stays put and doesn't slip around when I'm walking. I want these in every color!! I got the olive greenish color and I'm obsessed. I've gotten lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7 in all shoes and ordered a size 7.5 because I heard they ran small. They were still super tight in my foot and hard to pull on. I haven’t broken them in yet, so hopefully they will form to my foot once I wear them. Super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because they were too narrow for me but plan to purchase in wide if they become available in my size. Quality materials and nice look.
customer_reviews.author: amelee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Super cute, real suede leather! My only complaint is they do run a tad small, but not enough to where they don't fit, they're just on the tight side. I ordered a 6.5, and I'm normally a 6.5, I maybe could have fit into a 7.
customer_reviews.author: SMW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. They are my everyday shoes now for running errands and going on walks around the neighborhood with my dogs. I feel like you can't really go wrong with these, they go with just about any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on these. They look good and fit well. The only thing I would suggest is to go up a size if you wear liners like I do. Other than that these are comfortable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wanted slip on shoes that can wear without socks, even when I’m in my feet all day at work, they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! A muted mauve...not pink...very pretty. Very comfortable for my hard to fit size 11 foot!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You See
customer_reviews.text: The product was just as describe, having bought this for someone else it was important that I had an idea of what I was buying before hand, as much as you can online. With the shoes holding up to their description in rea life, the person I bought these for loved them and I had no troubles in regards to the shoes or in the act of purchasing and delivering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and cushioned! I love that they are cute, but also really support my feet when walking around. Very nice quality and versatile. I found these true to size (I’m an 8), but I do have a slightly narrow foot and these fit comfortably for me. They may not be great if you have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kllakes

customer_reviews.title: Where is my refund?!?
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too tight. Never worn - I paid a third of the price of the shoes to return them!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I know own three pairs of these shoes in different colors. Love them. . so comfy and a little more dressy then normal sneakers. Wash well and quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Watters

customer_reviews.title: Good price in a great color!
customer_reviews.text: I have many bordeaux/wine-colored shirts and was looking for some comfortable informal shoes to wear. These were a good price and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. T.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They were to narrow for me, and a little to dark green.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryd511

customer_reviews.title: Best Keds ever
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of shoes that are a similar look as these, but I've been searching for a better made shoe than ones I have. I've looked at vans, and finally settled on these. They did not disappoint!! They fit perfectly, and look great!
customer_reviews.author: LP051019

customer_reviews.title: Cute and SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and cute! I’m a teacher and walk all day -these are perfect -super comfortable but nice enough for work.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and so comfortable to wear, and great cushion for standing all day for my work.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Others suggest sizing up and so do I. I always wear a 7.5, I ordered these in 7.5 and 8 - the 8 is a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Olivia

customer_reviews.title: An all time favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Keds tennis shoes give you great support and the quality of this tennis shoe is perfect! Love the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great color (Forest Green) and fit
customer_reviews.text: I love keds they're the only brand sneakers I wear. This fit perfectly and are true to size. The color is a great muted almost dark sage color. They are narrow so I don't think that they would fit anyone with an even slighlty wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t work..
customer_reviews.text: These are cute shoes, but the back of the shoe is very stiff and I could tell it would cause blisters if I walked more in them.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. Easy to pair with jeans or leggings. They are comfortable and easy on and off. Shipping is quick and I am very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F. Dominey

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Ran shallow, smashed my toes. Shoe not tall enough to allow your toes to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these keds slip on sneakers. You can’t beat the price and they look great. I have three pairs: Rose, grey and just purchased the forest green. They’re just so easy!
customer_reviews.author: janet b

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger size but otherwise, great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I can tell they have great support and comfort but I got a size too small. I just had to order a bigger size and I cant wait!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Wenisch

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good quality. They were too narrow for my feet though, so had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds and these did not disappoint, would buy again; more colors please
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushioned shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very appealing. The color is exactly the same as pictured. I bought a size 10. The only problem is the shoe is tight around the arch area. Maybe , a 10 1/2 would be better. I also love that the shoe has great cushioning. I am just hoping in time it will stretch because it is a lovely shoe and I would like to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: sizing not consistent
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes and decent suede and quality for the price. Typically wear 8-1/2. I had to exchange for a 9 because they were a tad too short. Can barely get my foot in the 9 and the heel is way too narrow. Not an issue with the previous smaller size or in any shoe I've ever purchased. I do not have wide feet - very average and actually have narrow heels.
customer_reviews.author: Julia N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes but way too narrow. Wish they came in a wide. Good price but noticed it went up in price. Had to return. Didn’t have a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Size...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a similar pair of Keds in size 6.5 and they were really big, so I ordered these in size 6. So weird that these are a little small. Otherwise they look cute
customer_reviews.author: Amy Loyd

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers except
customer_reviews.text: for the fact that they do run narrow- especially in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette E. Gerlach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kicks
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes. They fit great and support my feet . I’m a stylist, so that is a big huge deal. I ordered 2 pair and getting a third one soon 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not only a great color, but the fit is perfect. The dream foam sole allows your feet to feel supported while walking. These will be my go to shoes for days when I’m on my feet for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: LA Girl

customer_reviews.title: Beware, narrow fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, as shown. But NARROW. I can barely wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Strey

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SHOES!!! More comfy than my vans. I wear a 10-101/2. I ordered a 11. They were a size too big. I ordered a10. Haven’t got the 10’s yet. But I would say they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Comforable and easy to walk in. I did have to wear a thinner sock with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Purchase  you WILL ❤️!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable!! I am on my feet all day and these are definitely the shoes for me! I like the style, it’s goes with everything. Need all the colors!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its a great nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: bought 1 for a year ago and was very comfortable and nice looking just bought the same again
customer_reviews.author: Mozes

customer_reviews.title: Like but not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! They are a little tight width-wise so I don’t reccomend if you have a wide foot!
customer_reviews.author: Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Order sizes up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 which is a half size up & still couldn't fit them. If you order please order 2 sizes up & make sure to get wide.
customer_reviews.author: Private mom

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide or fat feet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these shoes because they look cute and seemed like they would be comfortable, but my feet are on the wide side and have high arches, so they were just too tight for my comfort. Ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Haven't received my refund
customer_reviews.text: A bummer that these shoes didn't fit. So I returned them. Still haven't received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Walking comfort and style combined. A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Star R. Grover

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, love Keds, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Love keds shoes. Fits just right. Colors are great. They where delivered very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow and no give
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow and no room room to expand. Was excited by the color options however they have no give.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Sauvain

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I am almost tempted to buy a second pair in the same color. These go with everything, and honestly, have been such a great summer shoe! I wear them with no socks and have been comfortable the whole time. love love love them!
customer_reviews.author: jessie wharton

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but it was narrow and tight so I’m trying another brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found the best price on Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for fall... and very comfortable when you are on your feet all day
customer_reviews.author: Beth P.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Love! I have big feet, in my usual size 11 fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Little A

customer_reviews.title: Great fall color/fabric and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Keds are my go-to runaround sneaker that still looks cute.these are a beautiful, versatile color. I ordered a half-size up in these, since they’re for fall and I want to wear slightly thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Khristen Bendali

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Fit kind of tight but you just need to wear them out a bit, which you normally have to do with any shoe lol. I got half a size bigger than my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: These run incredibly small/narrow. I couldn't even get it on my foot
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I will be using these shoes to go shopping in as well as taking walks.
customer_reviews.author: FreddieDi

customer_reviews.title: One size too small.
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 10 in every other brand but for some reason had to return the size 10 and get a size 11. Other than that, it's a good pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Carlson Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and not too bulky which is what I worried about. Super comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great slip ons!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite! Very comfy, no blisters, could wear for 12 hrs straight!
customer_reviews.author: Petey Sasha

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend taking short walks in these to break them in. I got these for work and I absolutely love them. I’m on my feet all day and even after an eight hour shift my feet don’t hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfy! I definitely recommend getting a pair for casual wear or even business casual! I use mine in the work place. I will definitely buy more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: chanel

customer_reviews.title: Great once you break them in!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! They’re a bit narrow when you first get them so you have to break them in but once you do that they are the best! I wear them everyday, so comfy and they match with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good however I received 2 left shoes so I cannot wear. The seller should check the merchandise before shipping . I have returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Marl

customer_reviews.title: YAY KEDS
customer_reviews.text: ***** 5 star review!! Excellent fit & quality of this shoe is terrific!! YAY KEDS!!!!!!!! :]
customer_reviews.author: Gail N

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe. Narrow even for regular feet. Runs very small.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Soft foam and perfect fit. I'm usually a 5 but got the 5.5 and they fit perfectly. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small (I'd go half a size up so you could wear no show socks) and takes a while to break in but overall very nice and matches everything!
customer_reviews.author: Tria Cope

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute slip on sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and the color but not the large white band around the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Christilles

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! The shoe is well made and durable, while also being stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute, and complimented
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best. Super comfy, true to size, and adorable. Got compliments on them from the first time I wore them. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amerg

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but run a little small, I would go up half a size to a full size for a more comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: heather all

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Package was delayed for several weeks and when I did receive them they were rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Diedricks

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, super cute. they are narrow so not for wide food.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Slip On. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe. I’m on my feet all day and these shoes were wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Edge

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Dream Foam comfort. Good arch support excellent fit.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great Olive Green Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and the fit - but I actually thought that it was suede - and not corduroy !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kinder

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Double Decker Suede Sneaker
product_meta.description: A lesson in simple chic—our cushiony Double Decker leather slip on sneaker is one of those staples that always answers “what to wear.” Choose from 4 ultra-wearable shades: classic white, sleek black, rich cognac, or easy natural—or collect them all (your wardrobe will thank you).
